channel.title: Managing Codes :: Fusion CAC Documentation
channel.description: Upon opening the account for initial coding review, all the engine suggested codes will be listed in the Unassigned pane on the right-hand side under the Assigned Codes pane. Codes are placed into the following categories: Diagnosis Codes Procedure Codes CPTÂ® Codes From here, you can right-click on a code, then either Assign or Edit/Assign the selected code.
